text: Samantha Scaffidi (born March 3, 1989) is an American actress, writer, and director. She is known for her role as Victoria Heyes in the Terrifier movie franchise, appearing in Terrifier (2016), Terrifier 2 (2022) and Terrifier 3 (2024). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Samantha Scaffidi
